notes: Most accurate NES emulator; multi-system emulator also supporting SNES/GB/GBA/PCE/SMS/WS; Flatpak is unofficial
Cycle-accurate; fork of original Nestopia; .sav files stored alongside ROMs by default
Second most accurate NES emulator; Qt-based UI; no RetroArch core available
Feature-rich with Lua scripting and debugging tools; RetroArch core is FCEUmm (modified fork)
Cycle-accurate multi-system emulator; NES core on par with Mesen; save path configurable in Settings > Paths; no RetroArch core
Android-only; based on FCEUX; configurable save path via Options > System > Save Path
